General.Name: Dotz SA
General.Description: Dotz S.A. engages in the loyalty program business in Brazil. The company rewards its customers with loyalty currency for making transactions and payments at approximately 5,000 coalition outlets at offline partners, such as supermarkets, pharmacies, gas stations, restaurants, and others, as well as online marketplace. Dotz S.A. was founded in 2000 and is based in São Paulo, Brazil.
General.Address: rua Joaquim Floriano, nº 533, São Paulo, SP, Brazil

2.Name: Mr. Otavio Augusto Gomes de Araujo.
2.Title: Chief Financial and Investor Relations Officer
